summary: Seven long-time friends get together for a dinner. When they decide to share with each other the content of every text message, email and phone call they receive, many secrets start to unveil and the equilibrium trembles.
cast: Giuseppe Battiston|Anna Foglietta|Marco Giallini|Edoardo Leo|Valerio Mastandrea|Alba Rohrwacher|Kasia Smutniak|Benedetta Porcaroli|Elisabetta De Palo|Tommaso Tatafiore|Noemi Pagotto
keywords: lunar eclipse|dinner party|rome italy|group of friends|marriage
title: Perfetti sconosciuti
